generated_text:
- road: The image shows a cobblestone street with tram tracks running down the center, which is a type of road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian walkways are visible on both sides of the road, separated by poles and curbs, indicating sidewalks.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts.
- vegetation: Trees with green leaves are visible along the sidewalks and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Numerous pedestrians are visible walking along the sidewalks on both sides of the street.
- car: A white car is visible driving on the road ahead, and other cars are parked or driving in the distance.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the sidewalk near the center of the image.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked along the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging above the street.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the street, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalks, supporting signs and possibly traffic lights.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the left side of the image.
